doc.title: Isportaci kiz
doc.plot: Gul is a street vendor, working with her boyfriend Kartal and two friends Necdet and Huseyin together. Jale, daughter of rich Hulusi Bey is in love with Cafer, who is only after their fortune. His gangster boss wants him to kidnap Jale and demand a ransom. Gul looks like Jale very much. Hulusi Bey informs the police about the ransom. They meet with Cafer. Detective Zeki takes the money to Cafer. Right at that time, Gul and her friends get into a fight with the police. Zeki catches Gul as Jale. Hulusi Bey thinks she is Jale, too. They all find out about Hulusi Bey's daughter, and decide to help him. The bandits get arrested but Gul and her friends don't want Hulusi Bey's money. When Hulusi leaves for Iran, he gives Gul a package in which he says there is a wedding dress. When Gul and Kartal arrive home they open the package and find a letter written by Hulusi and huge sum of money.
